title: The Moderators
body: Its rare to see you moderators comment on anything that is not a pixel art contest. do you just comment on what you feel like and forget the rest?

replies.body:
Pretty much every post is read by at least one Rioter at some point, but it comes down to area of expertise and resources. 

Rioters are often employed for a very specific purpose, so answering anything outside that purpose isn't the best idea, since they might not have all the info and being red named are held as official sources (and therefore they have to make sure everything is correct and appropriate).

In addition to that, there are very few Rioters whose job specifically involves boards outside of specific events (like contests), especially on OCE. Maraudaur is an example of one whose does, but for the most part, if they are posting on boards they are doing it in their own time.

This is essentially the purpose of the volunteers (the Green, Blue, Yellow and Purple names). We exist to help take some of the load off the Rioters (who have other things that need doing) and to get answers to players faster. Of course we can't answer everything either, but we do what we can, especially when it comes to general questions.

Its also worth noting that not all volunteers are moderators, only Emissaries (Green), Instructors (Blue) and Wrenchmen (Yellow).
Are you referring to Riot themselves or the green, blue and purple people?
Riot sees pretty much every post they are just lazy and only comment on really important stuff otherwise that's what the special coloured people are for.
